data.title: Reverberations Session 5
data.description:
Archived on 2025-10-26, this archive contains 1129 messages between 10:03:38 PM to 2:49:08 AM.
					It has 58 dice rolls.

messages.content: Reverberations - Session 5
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: May 2008, Unknown. Albuquerque NM.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Relogging from chrome for performance, get me back on the new scene in a sec
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: The huge gangster, sweaty and veiny from all the roids, is splayed out wide on a shit-stinking couch.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He's playing with a bag of blue rocks.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "So… You want me to sell this?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: No reply.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He takes out a one of the rocks, crushes it and lays it over a large blade.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Roughly, he hits the line.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "PFOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "HOLY FUCK!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He's immediately up on his feet and tweaking.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "WHOOOOOOOOOO!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "HIT THIS SHIT!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I SAID HIT IT!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He looks at his bodyguards, who look at eachother in confusion.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I SAID! FUCKING! HIT IT!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He reaches out the huge machete-thing to their nostrils with more powder on it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Damn! Shit!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Fuuuahhh!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He does a few shadow box punches on his feet, pumped to the gills.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "So what the fuck did you put in this thing? It's amazing."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I can tell you what it's not."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Huh?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "It's not meth."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content:
"What the fhhhhhhh-"

The gorilla-like man collapses on the couch, fast asleep.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: His guards follow suite, right before flicking the safety off their MP5Ks.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The man takes out a snub-nose .38 revolver and points it at the gangsters face.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He pulls the hammer back, but hesitates in the last moment.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Instead, he reaches for a key in one of his jean pockets, like he himself put it in there.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He unlocks a locked drawer, taking out four vials of milky white liquid out of it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He looks at them for a moment, and then heads for the exit.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: May 8, 2008. Albuquerque.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Back in the trenches. It's about 11AM now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Your episode lasted about… 30 seconds.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: They got you on a chair and gave you some water, you seemed to recover from it, eventually.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The guy was laughing in your face the whole time, but he was helpful, after all you are his meal ticket.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The transaction is complete. If you have any parting words with him, it's time to share them now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: No.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: He bids you farewell as he runs his grubby fingers over the crisp bills.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle, Samantha. You can retroactively act between wake hour and 11AM.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David is watching over the guy. He is conscious now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Actions?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Had we sorted out the brainatter liquid?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Negative.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle spent that morning cooped away and carving a you-know-what out of the deceased cartillero's tooth.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: I think my priority is that. Where could I check it out?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Earle. Roll Skill (Gemcutting) Public.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

Slightly overweight, brown hair combed to one side, chevron moustache.

a- Born 1980 in Paris Texas to a single mother. Rough upbringing led him to (mostly) forswear drugs and alcohol, developed a complex against middle America, 'hicks' etc.

- Became interested in computer science during the dot-com bubble and left home to study I.T at 18.

- Married in 2003 while working the help-desk at Cisco. Made the majority of his income at this time via cable piracy - running services that could decrypt smart cards, set-top boxes etc.

- Became interested in libertarianism and conspiracy culture at around this time, which tied into much of his hacking work; claims to have worked with Gary McKinnon, among others.

- Joined FBI Operational Technology division in 2005, in part for work experience and in part to enter the 'belly of beast' as far as his interests are concerned ('is the government really messing with the weather?' etc).

- Continues to work in this capacity alongside his side-hustles; regarded by colleagues as reliable, if a little eccentric.

Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - New York","sex":"F","age":"36 - October 13 1971","education":"NYU Grossman School of Medicine."},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Samantha appears to be in her thirties with a comely nose and a sharp face. She's of average height, and aging has only recently started to creep in her features. She's of average weight, with dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. Furrows have started to form on her temple.

Samantha was interested in medicine from the moment

she listened to her father's heartbeat through his

stethescope. Smart and disciplined, she pushed through

a difficult education to become a trauma surgeon at the

NYU Grossman School of Medicine. By her early

thirties, she had already carved herself a reputation as a

skilled clinician and an accomplished researcher,

working to further the field of emergency medicine.

That reputation was tested the night her husband was

brought into her own hospital. He had been attacked,

initial reports indicating a mugging-gone-wrong.

Samantha was on call and prepared to operate, but

what she found was wrong; his bones and organs were

liquefied, and his vascular system ruptured in patterns

no aneurysm or illness could possibly explain.

She barely had time to process it before the body was

taken from her custody. Within hours, the chart was

scrubbed, and official records listed his death as a “

catastrophic hemorrhage.” Samantha, however,

remembered every detail. She knew what she saw, and

she knew someone else had made sure she wouldn't be

allowed to prove it.

Crushed but undeterred, she redirected her career.

Using her skills and connections, she entered the FBI’

Criminal Investigative Division as a forensic medical

specialist. For her past colleagues, it was a career

move. Secretly, it was a window for her to pursue her

own investigations regarding her husband's death.

Without telling anyone, she dug through case files:

unexplained autopsies, anomalies in forensic reports,

events that echoed what she’d seen on her husband’

s table.

She never said a word of her search to colleagues,

friends, or family. But Delta Green noticed.

Unauthorized queries, repeated hits on redacted case

numbers, her name appearing again and again where it

shouldn’t. They had already erased her husband’s

corpse, his grave had always been empty. Now, they

noticed they had left a loose end.

When they finally reached out, Samantha didn’t resist.

She'd been waiting for someone to admit what she

already knew: her husband’s death wasn’t natural.

Husband's death preceded Samantha's induction into the FBI and Delta Green by a few years. (Inducted into the FBI in 2000, DG in 2006) Before that time, the family was peaceful. Afterwards, she decided to send her son to boarding school, leaving home at the age of 13. She only sees her son in the summers, with the rare visit to his out-of-state school. Nowadays he's off to college, calling only out of necessity and a need for money. He's still affectionate towards her, but resents her for leaving him all by himself. One could say she doesn't know her own son.

messages.content: Samantha. Without a doubt, this is condensed Reverb. It's pure, crystallized.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: In it's metabolized form it hums a little bit quieter. Not the chaotic wave patterns of the pillpressed version, but a stable, pure compound.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: To have accumulated this much of it… just how much of them did Damien take exactly?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: His tox screen does show a hefty dose of MDMA. Mixer in Reverb, but if he has -that- much it means he should have swallowed a fucking ton of pills. Either over a long time period, or right before his death. You fail to make a comment about how quickly this thing reaches LD50 in the body.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I'm sure we'll have more autopsies to have an idea.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Besides, although you have no word of it yet, you do not have any Liao to put under the microscope.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Or the crystallography machine, the not-metaphorical device.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: khoka is afk
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: We are synchronized now, the entire party can list their Actions.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Before anything else… Would Doug be able to get anything out of Finnegan related to just what exactly happened in that chinaman's store? What effect could that image of Shukoran have had? Doesn't seem like an easy question to breach, though…
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Doug. You do jog back and forth in your mind, and it's abundantly clear that you have no idea what the fuck is going on. You didn't drink the proverbial kool-aid yet, and you're out of the loop for everything save for Finnegan's racial rants.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You just haven't been that "into it" to piece it together.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I suppose being knocked out cold like that is something that just happens. Fair enough.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Finnegan suggests that he has some inkling of an idea as to what's going on in New Mexico. A working theory.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: khoka is back
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: He would do good to share it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: If there's nothing urgent on the horizon there's a lead Earle was meaning to chase up. That Angular Atelier place - they hadn't had any luck staking it out, but what if one of them… just goes in and gets a tattoo? Chats with the people in there in the meantime, see if it amounts to anything? Couldn't hurt if there's nothing more productive to do.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Frank.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're a chubby grown ass man screaming "fed", it's extremely "uncool" of you to be doing such a thing. You can attempt it but you can tell that you'll shit the bed horrendously and embarass yourself.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're simply not a part of that life, or crowd.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Two different groups. Gonxu - he's old-school, first generation. I think some of the younger ones… The Tcho-Tchos, here… Got some of that tribal knowledge, however they did, and they're the ones doping, pressing, selling. The Mexican connection is some deep shit a few of these people have fallen into."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Perhaps he'll ask Doug to do it in his stead at some point. If nothing else it will be kinda funny if he fails.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "They needed someone to do the legwork, to distribute, all of it. The Spider was one of them."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: No actions listed so far- give me actions people.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Richard seems to be onto something here.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: I'm waiting for news.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: On what to do.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Did we happen to grab Mad Dog because his prints popped positive on the Lucas death car?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You are aware that those three left for something this morning, maybe you could call them over cell.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Mad Dog is currently tied to a structural post in your basement.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "…And in case it needed to be spelled out, Jianyu and Xifeng are part of that second cohort of Tcho-Tcho-Americans. They named their whole outfit after the subject of that fucking Halloween poster."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: I'll just head to the industrial district to group up with the rest.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Finnegan. It does make sense, after all, the 2005 raid should have taken out a substantial chunk of them to relocate such distance.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Maybe the mix-in with the cartel was more necessity than choice?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's exactly what he's proposing. This close to the border, Latin crime is a quick fix for the dumb and dirty labor end.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You discuss the topic over lunch. It's now 12:00.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're all together in there.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: We should probably start asking our special guest some questions about the operation. Too bad we turned his house into a crime scene - who knows how much evidence is in there.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Who knows indeed. Who else joins it?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: For lack of other sensible options, Doug would.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Doug, reminder that this is not the usual good cop bad cop stuff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug is neither kind of cop at this point. It'll work out.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: It's McCannon's prisoner-of-war. Finnegan is trying to connect the dots to the club in his mind and mulling over perfectly geometric toilet blast shards.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Frank volunteers to join, excepting the possibility that Richard wants him as far away from him as possible after last night.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Three's a crowd.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Right. Before we continue…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: EVERYONE, Blind INT Roll.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content:
The weather is breezy today. After a nice cup of afternoon coffee, your spirits start to come back from the scorching broiler surface of the New Mexican sun.

McCannon: you could still attempt to dig out information about Pastor. You got a name, and something about him being ex-military.

Finnegan: you could possibly catch a re-run of last nights Oprah at the safehouse.

Earle: you're acutely aware that no one has conducted an interview with a real immigration authority about the Tchotcho, and you haven't checked out other crime scenes yet.

Doug: you're quite sure that you can buy some fireworks without showing ID in the state of New Mexico, alongisde hollowed out galvanized steel tubes, and caps.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Now, everyone, actions in one sentence please.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That sounds like it'd come in useful. I am pretty sure I can, but will I? Doug goes to procure the materials.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Doug. You pay in cash for a Standard expense for everything. Blind Craft (IED) Roll.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I want to see if I can't get a hit on the Pastor dude in the DEA database.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You manage to make three solid pipe bombs, heavy in hand. You're sure they'll work. You hope.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: If Earle is going to try to talk to someone from ICE or CBP, Finnegan will tag along to make sure that maniac doesn't publicly humiliate the Bureau.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: I do hope. I suppose the others don't know about this, and they don't need to yet.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: You're working inside the garage, it will take until 3PM.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I'll go with Finnegan, I don't have a priority right now.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: McCannon. You got a hit. But it looks like a gerbil due to how classified it is.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Small aside: Finnegan relates Shen's alleged list of ingredients for Liao to Cliff, just to have some peace of mind that the old fuck is lying.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Earle thus sends a couple emails to USCIS types seeing if he can't secure a chat over coffee with somebody about the Tcho Tcho. He'll try and rope the cell's resident China hand into said interview if he's free and if he isn't permaently put off working with him after the shotgun incident yesterday.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Ekon Cole. Two tours in Afghanistan, honorable discharge after dismissed charges of smuggling in court martial. After that, two tours in Unknown with Blackwater, now Academi.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're fairly certain, with your anti-terrorism background, you can get an interview with an Academi representative.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Conversely, no one else in the party would be able to strike up a date with such a personality. They outright refuse to work with no subpoena these days unless it's anti-terrorism.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan. The list of inactive ingredients is pretty standard Chinese medicine stuff that should not hurt unless consumed in kilogram-amounts. You have absolutely no fucking clue about the pharmakokinetics of the mixture, and have no way of knowing without an extended animal trial.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: With that being, you three hit the local ICE office. It's two blocks down the FBI office.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Jujube and goat milk, my ass. These people are synthesizing something that'd make missile silo acid hippies blush, and they aren't doing it with acupuncture.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Finnegan, Samantha, Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: How do I say this…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Too many cooks?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: After waiting an hour to talk to an agent, and an hour for him to be done with "looking things up in the files", it's made clear to you that ICE Albuquerque has no idea about the ethnic groups that go by the name of Tchotcho, Chauchua or Chochua. It is not legally recognized in the paperwork, and the agents seem to have no clue about it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: They are extraordinarily rare deportees, often listed under the "ethnicity" tied to their legal host country like China, Vietnam or Cambodia.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Are they willing to show us naturalization paperwork or visa status for someone? Shen Gongxu, specifically - worst case scenario, we just find out these people go as Han or Khmer on paper.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You take another extra hour…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Nothing. Illegal immigrants.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Are those all the names you've been thinking of?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: No - we'll ping CHEN JIANYU and DONG XIFENG just to be safe.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Loud incorrect buzzer. Nada.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Roll INT.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: All of us?
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd
PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd
messages.content:
Success
1d100 5
  1. 5

5

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

messages.content: Just Finn.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The girl.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What was she called?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Let me check my notes, that lawyer blindsided my memories.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: …I did not write it down. That's lost to time and space. Earle, Cliff?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You have 60 seconds.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I'm looking for it in my… memories… to no avail.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Will Earle clutch?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Yi Leng."
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: HE DOES!
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: How the fuck did he remember that?
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Oh. That one. I thought you meant the club girl.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Born in Chicago, 1990. Orphan, out of the foster care system.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: BA Microbiology in UNM. Legal owner of Thank You Tea Shop.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What do you make of that?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: In any case, the ICE agent who has been accompanying you so far is giving you all kinds of weird looks about it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Microbiology? That's our mark. Let's leave and pull her address from another database - something stupid, like the DMV.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "What do you figure her relationship to the old guy is? If they're not related, I mean…"
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: No need to fiddle with it, her business adress is the same as her residential. You know how that works.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "People can be related without sharing a surname. We don't have time to talk about Asian kinship groupings."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Eyup."
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: I call McCannon to let him know a Tcho-Tcho with a microbiology degree owns that tea shot.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: It's complicated… McCannon. I didn't hear what you did after digging up that guy in the DEA database.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I can give a call to Academi and try to bullshit my way into getting more info.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Although I'm not sure how aside from trying to use Federal authority.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You'll have to leave a legitimate Bureau badge number to get this through, if you have no other ways to finesse it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You have it memorized.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Given that we're using fake identities and badges, I don't think the undercover guy is going to know jack shit about my personal investigations into pastor.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Indeed it's a pretty long shot for them out of all people to piece it together.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: There's a NM representative… in Santa Fe right now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's a ways.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: It's actually a 90 minute drive on a good day.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You still do have a guest sitting back home, though.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You feel like you could make it right before today's shift ends.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I think we should leave that for after the guest.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Right on, let's get to that.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: khoka is afk
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Right.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Who goes first?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: khoka is back
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Finnegan or Michael perhaps?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Perhaps. By the way, I forgot to mention that the trunk of the Corolla is lathered in dry blood.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Leave Dr. Waterboarding Torture for after. Somebody else go first.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: It's not visible from the outside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You'll have to detail it, though, and it will take a while.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan will talk to him, if nobody else has the balls to take the lead.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Finnegan. The guy looks up to you and cackles.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Fuck you."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff opens the door for Finnegan as he enters.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "If you're gonna kill me do it!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He rattles the handcuffs.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "If we were going to kill you, don't you think you'd be sharing a seven-foot underground residence with your brother in the desert by now?"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: She closes it behind herself, and waits by the door.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "What, that your bitch or something?" He nods at Samantha
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He ugly laughs.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "Man, fuck you…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "He was a good guy."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff crosses her arms and stares at Molina.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "Not a good shot, in any case."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "What do you want from me."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Well, we could play twenty questions, and I know you're not a stranger to that game…  Or you can tell me how the fuck a bunch of Mexicans ended up carrying around shit straight from China."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Why should I tell you that shit if you're gonna kill me afterwards anyway?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan thinks about it. "You could walk. But you'd much rather talk to me than the other guy. You know his face. Not pleasant."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Finnegan. Persuasion, Blind.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd
messages.content:
CRITICAL SUCCESS!
1d100 1
  1. 1

Safe Streets and Gang Unit","nationality":"American - New Jersey","sex":"M","age":"29 - 19 May 1979","education":"Rutgers, BS in Criminology and Criminal Justics"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

messages.content: "…Motherfucker."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Okay. Just don't let him in."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Pinky promise."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Yeah bro, fine."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I stole that shit from the white boy."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "And his chrome hearts."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "He comes to me for meth, one day he comes to me for that stupid bullshit."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I see red you know, I mean how the fuck you gonna sell the product of two different people at the same time?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Fucking white people man… Anyway, I dropped one and it was pretty alright."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Then I realized I should cut him off after he said some nonsense about the Tongs."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "It's like cartel, but for Chinese."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: He nods to his small jean pocket. The square one right behind the regular pocket.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "It's in there."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You know what happened to him?"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Who you mean?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Your 'white boy'. Damien."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Is that the motherfucker who stole my car?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan shakes his head. "Who'd you rip the pills off of?"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Frank fishes out the contents of Domingo's pockets before tossing them Samatha's way.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "It's him damnit. I haven't seen him since I stole his shit last Sunday. Look, it's in my fucking pocket."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan. You find a Chrome Hearts cross pendant in that pocket, with a black paracord instead of the usual chain.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You're probably not going to see him again, either, unless you're going to the funeral." He adjusts his glasses.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Who killed the motherfucker though?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Your friend?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: averagejoe22 is afk
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: "The way it's starting to fall together, it's whoever he was supposed to be selling those pills for."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Cliff silently walks around the edges of the room.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "It's the Tongs. The chinese motherfuckers."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Vicious people, man."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "We've been at cold war for years."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You get a lot of 'em in New Mexico? A little far from California."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "I don't know how the fuck they here."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "They say they airlift their product. That's far out."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "No shit."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: averagejoe22 is back
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: He looks at Earle and Samantha in case they have any inputs while he makes a note on his paper.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "They got some black dude selling to their dealers for some reason."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I heard about it from the cracker."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff shakes her head.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "Y'think that's the guy McCannon mentioned?" Earle asks to Richard.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "It's not rocket science. I just want to know how they're flying planes. Their company was busted up years ago. There's a paper trail, maybe."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "You tell me man, I'm no insider to that shit."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You know where these guys hang out, deal? I don't exactly have a map."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Logically, how is he supposed to know?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He isn't. It was for the other agents.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "No, they're lowkey as fuck, they lose and gain territory a lot."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "That's how they move."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Ever seen them tag something?"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "And I'm guessing we're not getting a… name or face or nothing for that nigger you say's caught up in all this."
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "Yeah, like some devil shit on a wall."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I've seen it."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He pauses at you saying the hard R like that.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan nods.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: He clicks his tongue. "Man, who you got me in here with…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He looks away, immediately embarrassed.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "In fact who the fuck is you in the first place?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Well, we said we wouldn't play twenty questions. That goes both ways. Do I look like a Chinese drug dealer?"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Uh… You just look like some cream cheese white boy… uheheheh…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: His teeth are still bloody.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "And you look like a fuckin' landscaper who got lost somewhere between the taco stand and Home Depot."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Never heard that one before."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Another ugly laugh, extra ugly.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Finnegan, this conversation is derailing hopelessly.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan shakes his head and moves to step out; update McCannon that Pastor is a hard link, and that Tiger Transit evidently wasn't the end for planes and Tcho-Tchos.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: What now?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Frank looks at Richard and then at Mad Dog as though to ask what they're doing with the guy now.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: We all know what happens next don't we.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He seems to be in peace with it like a bad-ass. Unlike you bunch.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I'm behind him right?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: The silence is echoing.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Yes you are.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Well… I'll give a look at Finnegan.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: One of Cliff's hand reaches for her weapon.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Finnegan gives a tight-lipped shrug of the head and looks away. Fuck that.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd
4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
messages.content:
Failure

messages.content: He's unaware.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He sees Samantha pull steel and walks out.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: I'm… how far away now?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Let's see.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: You're right behind him.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan, you're staying for it?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: 2-3 meters. I'll take two steps and shoot him in the back of the head right away.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: I'll have to be back to clean up and move him, might as well stay.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Samantha.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You blow his brains out.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He limps over next to the pole.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: No coming back from that.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Samantha holsters her weapon after the unceremonious execution.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Samantha, Finnegan, Earle. SAN roll.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Blind of course
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

Safe Streets and Gang Unit","nationality":"American - New Jersey","sex":"M","age":"29 - 19 May 1979","education":"Rutgers, BS in Criminology and Criminal Justics"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

Criminal Investigative Division","employer":"FBI D.C. Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - New York","sex":"F","age":"36 - October 13 1971","education":"NYU Grossman School of Medicine."},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Samantha appears to be in her thirties with a comely nose and a sharp face. She's of average height, and aging has only recently started to creep in her features. She's of average weight, with dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. Furrows have started to form on her temple.

Samantha was interested in medicine from the moment

she listened to her father's heartbeat through his

stethescope. Smart and disciplined, she pushed through

a difficult education to become a trauma surgeon at the

NYU Grossman School of Medicine. By her early

thirties, she had already carved herself a reputation as a

skilled clinician and an accomplished researcher,

working to further the field of emergency medicine.

That reputation was tested the night her husband was

brought into her own hospital. He had been attacked,

initial reports indicating a mugging-gone-wrong.

Samantha was on call and prepared to operate, but

what she found was wrong; his bones and organs were

liquefied, and his vascular system ruptured in patterns

no aneurysm or illness could possibly explain.

She barely had time to process it before the body was

taken from her custody. Within hours, the chart was

scrubbed, and official records listed his death as a “

catastrophic hemorrhage.” Samantha, however,

remembered every detail. She knew what she saw, and

she knew someone else had made sure she wouldn't be

allowed to prove it.

Crushed but undeterred, she redirected her career.

Using her skills and connections, she entered the FBI’

Criminal Investigative Division as a forensic medical

specialist. For her past colleagues, it was a career

move. Secretly, it was a window for her to pursue her

own investigations regarding her husband's death.

Without telling anyone, she dug through case files:

unexplained autopsies, anomalies in forensic reports,

events that echoed what she’d seen on her husband’

s table.

She never said a word of her search to colleagues,

friends, or family. But Delta Green noticed.

Unauthorized queries, repeated hits on redacted case

numbers, her name appearing again and again where it

shouldn’t. They had already erased her husband’s

corpse, his grave had always been empty. Now, they

noticed they had left a loose end.

When they finally reached out, Samantha didn’t resist.

She'd been waiting for someone to admit what she

already knew: her husband’s death wasn’t natural.

Husband's death preceded Samantha's induction into the FBI and Delta Green by a few years. (Inducted into the FBI in 2000, DG in 2006) Before that time, the family was peaceful. Afterwards, she decided to send her son to boarding school, leaving home at the age of 13. She only sees her son in the summers, with the rare visit to his out-of-state school. Nowadays he's off to college, calling only out of necessity and a need for money. He's still affectionate towards her, but resents her for leaving him all by himself. One could say she doesn't know her own son.

Slightly overweight, brown hair combed to one side, chevron moustache.

a- Born 1980 in Paris Texas to a single mother. Rough upbringing led him to (mostly) forswear drugs and alcohol, developed a complex against middle America, 'hicks' etc.

- Became interested in computer science during the dot-com bubble and left home to study I.T at 18.

- Married in 2003 while working the help-desk at Cisco. Made the majority of his income at this time via cable piracy - running services that could decrypt smart cards, set-top boxes etc.

- Became interested in libertarianism and conspiracy culture at around this time, which tied into much of his hacking work; claims to have worked with Gary McKinnon, among others.

- Joined FBI Operational Technology division in 2005, in part for work experience and in part to enter the 'belly of beast' as far as his interests are concerned ('is the government really messing with the weather?' etc).

- Continues to work in this capacity alongside his side-hustles; regarded by colleagues as reliable, if a little eccentric.

messages.content: You're getting used to this way too quickly.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: However, Samantha, the weight falls on you that you just snuffed out the candle of another human being, no matter how worthless.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Something about a hypocratic oath?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's irrelevant now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Samantha, blind d4. Finnegan, blind d2.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d4","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":4,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":3,"active":true}]}],"total":3,"evaluated":true}
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d2","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":2,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":1,"active":true}]}],"total":1,"evaluated":true}
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: His brains are all over your shoes, Finnegan. It looks like jam.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle, despite your spiralling down, you have more important things to attend to than a dead gangster. Like your beautiful, beautiful sculpture.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff takes a deep breath as she corrects her suit. Time for cleanup.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "Oh… God." I don't suppose there's an oily rag somewhere in this dilapidated basement…
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You'll need a bit more than that…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Continuing.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're taking the chevy to Santa Fe. It's the car that's not dead body scented.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's what I was thinking.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You bunch, luckily you'll do two birds with one stone when you detail that Corolla.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: How do you handle the body?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Hopefully we had the wisdom to pick up some trashbags when we got the shovel for the last one. Anything to prevent even more leakage.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: There's some in the house. The good old trashbag pinata?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You can fit a lot of human being in a five-gallon black trashbag.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: With or without chopping them up. But since it's not going down in the bottom of the ocean you reckon just wrapping him with it would suffice.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: …this guy was using or not?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Using what?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You should probably, uhh, do this thing away from me." Frank says of the body, half-excusing his behaviour yesterday. "I don't think seeing that sorta thing helped when-- y'know…"
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: It doesn't take a genius to tell that a gangster who shoots back is a polysubstance abuser.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Just making sure we're not missing out on any Reverb brain juice.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: You'll have to resort to butchery.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Without a care for the body… I reckon it wouldn't take long to take it out.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: I can do it before we put him in a ditch or whatever.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "What do you actually expect to find that you didn't already blow out his forehead?"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Samantha. Cutting up a body in your basement with kitchen tools is a whole another ball game than the autopsy you're used to. The thought irks you.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The amygdala is not exposed.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Samantha hesitates at Finnegan's words.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "Would it not be useful to get more of it?"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "To do fucking what with it?" He snaps.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Y'think getting another sample of the stuff will even--"
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: He gets cut short by Richie.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "Finnegan, we don't know how many samples of this we'll run into."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: No one asked you to retrieve samples of user brain matter, just to make it clear.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "But alright. Let's move on."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "The sooner he's underground, the better. There's red-handed and red-fucking-handed." He shakes his head. "Just hold this tape."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Dude. It's that show you were talking about."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Oprah's on."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Let's drive and get rid of this thing before it's pitch black out.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You already got three hands… you're not sure if there will be another re-run of that.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You did put in work with the convincing down there.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Sure. I'll watch this and then find a change of clothes. Or shoes.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Right. Samantha, Doug and Earle are on the job.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Which direction are you heading out to?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: We dumped his gunman north of here right? Let's just go there.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Christ, this again. Doug would rather do a lot of other jobs than this. Say, do we recall where we buried the last guy?
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: You have a rough idea of it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Looks like you agree on doing it again.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Reluctantly.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Without an easily accesible vat of acid, this is the best option.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: This is probably bad practice from a True Crime novel perspective but who the fuck cares.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Very bad practice.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: The dig is uneventful. All of you already witnessed his brains being splattered outwards.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It will take a few hours to accomplish.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Any words to share?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: None at all, although he's grimacing the whole time at the thought of things turning out the way they did last time.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Deep inside, you don't really give a shit about it, do you now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You know… Coming into this, I thought we'd have people do the digging for us."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: YOU are the people in question! 60 seconds.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I thought I'd have a Hugh Hefner mansion at this age but what do you know." He seems eager to get this over with without the introspection.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "One seems more realistic than the other."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Cliff continues the rest of the dig in silence.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You make it with ample time.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're wiping your shoes off with a wet wipe as the TV runs.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Before it gets to the part with the TchoTchos…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're watching a debate between Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton, held at the National Constitution Center in Philadelphia, moderated by Charles Gibson and George Stephanopoulos. It's mainly about Obama’s association with Reverend Jeremiah Wright, who has a long history of making public anti-American assertions.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: George Stephanopoulos: “Senator Obama, you’ve been associated with Reverend Jeremiah Wright, who has made a number of controversial statements. Can you explain to voters why you remained in that church for so long and why you didn’t distance yourself earlier?”
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: “I have said before that the comments that have been made and that have appeared in these news reports offend me. They rightly offend all Americans. Those comments do not reflect my values, and they do not reflect my faith. Reverend Wright is someone who helped bring me to Christianity and who spoke out about social justice, but he has also said things that are simply wrong. I have condemned those statements unequivocally.”
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: “Well, I think that’s a fair question, George. You know, we all have to take responsibility for our associations. And people will have to decide whether Senator Obama’s relationship with Reverend Wright raises concerns for them. For me, the issue is about leadership — about whether you’re ready on day one to be commander-in-chief.”
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: “This is an example of what I think the American people are tired of — distractions and divisions that have nothing to do with how we’re going to help the American people get health care, make college affordable, or bring our troops home. That’s the debate I want to have.”
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It runs on…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You getting that?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He's drinking a RedBull.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Paying attention to the election is part of the job." He dryly states.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Yeah I'm partial to Hillary on this one."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I think Barrack's story, uh… Well, it resonates with me. Big city, I guess. I feel like I know him."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You get a bit of ads before it skips to the next section.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: khoka is afk
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "Hello everyone, tonight on Oprah Show we have Miss Cho Tsu-Tsao from the Chauchua American Advocacy Alliance… Good evening."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Hey Oprah, it's great to be on the show."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Everyone has to have a fucking advocacy alliance these days, Jesus."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Ms. Cho is the president of the Genetic Agricultural Products based in Chicago and founder of the alliance… Ms. Cho, I understand that you have some longstanding issues with Dr. Henrietta Cole's study regarding the Tchotchos."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Care to share what's wrong wid it?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Let me say at the outset, I'm not here as a business owner, I'm here as a proud Chauchua, born and raised in Chicago. Go Bulls!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "And you're right, but you're putting it too mildly. The fact is, this study by Henrietta Cole is nothing more than racist psuedoscience."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: khoka is back
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "Her so called findings aren't fit for a phrenologists dream journal… The University of Chicago ought to be ashamed!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: She goes on to criticize the things you saw on the paper. Their amicability, their norms, their familial ties…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: To her, you, the viewer, is just a bigoted American who knows no better.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Man, fuck that noise. I know what I read."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You and me both. That fucking snake."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content:
"Look at this shit."

He passes you a laptop.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Tiger Transit, operating out of 20 states including New Mexico, is based in Albuquerque Double Eagle Airfield. Owned by a subsidiary of a subsidiary of her.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It wasn't seized like the briefing said? Or maybe this is just deeper.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Who knows what legal hoops they jumped through to actually get it back to some capacity.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Seized, more like reposessed, but to who?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: A lot of things do not make sense about this case.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Not, like I was hoping, an FBI shell company. We'll have to get into this.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Maybe that's part of why you're here?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Many threads in one web, and so on.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "…And I'll see you this Saturday on the Oprah Show."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Commercials.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He relaxes and sinks into the couch.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Well, it looks like the Mexican connection might just be a mishap. But that club owner, that greasy prick--"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "I think he still knows something. I can't prove it."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "This shit might be going deeper than the club."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Typical fallacy man, stuck on one clue."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Perfect is the enemy of good. I can't help it."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: What time is it?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Around 4.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: We should go to the airport tonight.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: DE Airfield is significantly smaller compared to Sunport and is made up of privately owned hangars.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Before we do that, Santa Fe.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You agreed to meet up in a small coffee shop with your contact.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Anything you wish to do before moving on?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It is, after all, the first capital city in North America.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The city looks like half spic tourist trap and half Spanish fort. He really doesn't give a shit about New Mexico that much.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: This place is so much better compared to Albuquerque it's unreal.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's like color TV versus 19th century developed film.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: We've upgraded from nothing to adobe huts.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: That's one way to put it. Anyway.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're at the spot.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The rich smell of roast coffee overwhelms your nose. The cashier gives you a momentary look before turning away from your killer energy.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It was not a compliment. What now?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Who's my contact here? McCannon is grabbing a double-espresso first, though.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Just one person in a three piece other than you.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You wait in line for a minute before getting that coffee.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's rich, smooth and very strong.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Enjoy…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon goes to introduce himself to the woman in the 3-piece.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "And you're Mr. McCannon? FBI CT?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Yes ma'am," he sips his espresso, "I assume you're my Academi meet?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content:
"Yes, Aisha Monique, intel analyst."

You shake hands.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Right, right, pleased to meet you. As you know I'd like to ask a few questions about an ex-contractor - Ekon Cole."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "Yes, I did my own bit of research on him."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "It seems that we let him go due to confirmed suspicion of facilitating substance smuggling."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You know how these things are."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Less everyone knows about it, the better."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Was this when the company was still Blackwater?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "The name is quite recent, so yes, by at least 3 years."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Exemplary contractor, too bad he had a side hustle going on."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Our pay is top of the line too."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I don't doubt it."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content:
"In case you'd ever want to look into it."

She passes you a business card.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I appreciate the gesture and I'll take the card," McCannon nods and pockets the business card: "but I'm not leaving Federal payroll anytime soon."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Anything further would positively be prying. Ask a question and throw a Persuade, Blind dice.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Say…. do you happen to know exactly what he was smuggling in Afghanistan? Just opium?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
messages.content:
Success

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content: "Just like everyone else. You know how it goes. He was already on VA benefits when he applied."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "He did get into a few brawl incidents but no one was badly hurt."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Tough guy."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Fantastic shot too. Can't talk much about it but the count goes in dozens."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon grimaces internally a bit. If we do have to kill this guy we'll need Doug to plant a bomb in his car or something, because a gunfight will not end well for us.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Anything more you wish to know?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're both running out of time.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Sorry if I'm making you repeat yourself here - but did he seperate from Academi because of doing more of the same shit or was it a mutual seperation?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content: "Hm. Well, Mr. McCannon, I think that was all the information I am at the liberty to share with you."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Of course, with utmost professionality, this goes well into court order territory."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: She begins packing up.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Well, thank you for your time anyways."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "You too. Have a good evening."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: She leaves, calmly.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're left alone with your empty espresso cup.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Just like the last time.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Just another one of those people whose entire history you can tell by their race and career choice. Black woman intel analyst in a PMC? Military brat who went on to join the Army herself. Classic.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: A bit too rude. You're free to make all of these comparisons within your own mind where no one else can hear.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Academi is an equal oppurtunity employer and has thousands of support staff on state side.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Whatever, McCannon feels that he didn't really get anything much aside from the fact that they should really just bomb this fucking guy and is wondering if Academi are running their own investigation into him simultaneously.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: When in doubt, JDAM. Except we are in New Mexico, not Somalia.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Evening.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: In your lack of interest, David has decided to spend his time going to one of the scenes of disappearance.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: A one bedroom apartment at the edges of La Mesa.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Save for the bedroom, the apartment looks normal.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: For that part, it looks like someone took a sledgehammer to the place.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David takes some photos of the scene.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He then…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
messages.content:
Success

  1. 20

6'5. Skinny. Blonde, blue eyes. Disproportionate long arms. Wide face and clavicles.

was investigating federal criminal audit

money laundering. lots of incoming subscriptions, library unexpected, unjustified for the area.

turns out its actually large library book club

tracked missing person, the book club president

investigated their domicile

found entire place ransacked and a book with most pages ripped out

found some pages that go against what he had learned during his cherished study of history

case ends inconclusive

started researching it in free time

DG's Carnivore-fork protocol detected his questions, silent alert is raised

he is contacted, debriefed thoroughly

several points he raises are analyzed and cross-referenced as useful deductions

investigation think-tank permits transfer of federal asset to DG

instruction and briefing commences, works on minor cases

was investigating federal criminal audit

turns out its actually large library book club

tracked missing person, the book club president

investigated their domicile

found entire place ransacked and a book with most pages ripped out

found some pages that go against what he had learned during his cherished study of history

case ends inconclusive

started researching it in free time

DG's Carnivore-fork protocol detected his questions, silent alert is raised

he is contacted, debriefed thoroughly

several points he raises are analyzed and cross-referenced as useful deductions

investigation think-tank permits transfer of federal asset to DG

instruction and briefing commences, works on minor cases

messages.content: Nothing oh-so-special about them.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It is factually close to the findings at the nightclub.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Besides these, not a whole lot to speak of here.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He looks around the place for one last time and begs leave.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon. You have enough time to fulfill one more action.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Rest of you are preoccupied with body disposal and washing the blood covered Corolla.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It will take the rest of the day with 4 people on it. It's just fucked, but you do have the necessary stuff at hand. It won't look flawless but it won't look like someone was killed in the back seat.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon, make it count. It's night.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: When did the undercover dude and Pastor plan their meet?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Tomorrow.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Noted. I need to pull data on Li Yeng.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: What kind?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Li Yeng has no arrest record, you already know that.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Address, properties, so forth.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: We know Thank you tea shop
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Gone and done. Tea shop. For all intents and purposes that girl is clean and not a drug dealer.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Not without any upcoming evidence.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You have another minute to think before defaulting to bed.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Not sure, then. Back to bed and then we can see about the ABQ Airfield TT link and the Pastor meet.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Very well.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The house is dead quiet. You know that this is not the usual frat party.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You heard Finnegan and the guys chatting up a few nights back but it's been mostly silence since the shooting.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're all heading to bed. Subtract one from your medicine, and if you have a word to Diaz, go ahead.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Meds also applies to everyone, just so you know.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Lorazepam eaten.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: I inform AD Diaz specifically about the Afghanistan vet link.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "noted."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's all.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's about 10 in the morning, and everyone is still in the house. Yesterday has been tough on everyone.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What are you doing?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cereal for breakfast again?
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: I ask David if TT has an office at ABQ Double Eagle?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Unless you want eggs.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Eggs sounds nice
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: You're affirmed, they do. Not much else.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Did we get a home address for the owner of the tea shop?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: It's the tea shop.,
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: It's literally right above the shop.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Obviously some kind of front-y legal loophole shit is going on but are you really here to deport people?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It hasn't been forwarded to anyone yet and the ICE agent that was with you has no idea.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Frank has an inkling that there's gonna be trouble tonight and so, if there's nothing else K-Cell will literally force him out for this morning, he works to finish his charm. Away from the others of course.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Earle. You got up a little earlier than others and managed to finish it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Do feel free to describe what it looks like.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan. You didn't get around to preparing the Liao.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: A crude facsimile of the face he saw way back when on one side and a dotted sauvastika on the other.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Are the directions substantive, or do they look like bullshit?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: What does Cliff think about it?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I did try to show her yesterday. What's the doctor's opinion?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Cliff, if you wish to aid Finnegan, roll Pharmacy Blind.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI
messages.content:
Failure
1d100 85
  1. 85

85
