Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - New York","sex":"F","age":"36 - October 13 1971","education":"NYU Grossman School of Medicine."},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Samantha appears to be in her thirties with a comely nose and a sharp face. She's of average height, and aging has only recently started to creep in her features. She's of average weight, with dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. Furrows have started to form on her temple.

Samantha was interested in medicine from the moment

she listened to her father's heartbeat through his

stethescope. Smart and disciplined, she pushed through

a difficult education to become a trauma surgeon at the

NYU Grossman School of Medicine. By her early

thirties, she had already carved herself a reputation as a

skilled clinician and an accomplished researcher,

working to further the field of emergency medicine.

That reputation was tested the night her husband was

brought into her own hospital. He had been attacked,

initial reports indicating a mugging-gone-wrong.

Samantha was on call and prepared to operate, but

what she found was wrong; his bones and organs were

liquefied, and his vascular system ruptured in patterns

no aneurysm or illness could possibly explain.

She barely had time to process it before the body was

taken from her custody. Within hours, the chart was

scrubbed, and official records listed his death as a “

catastrophic hemorrhage.” Samantha, however,

remembered every detail. She knew what she saw, and

she knew someone else had made sure she wouldn't be

allowed to prove it.

Crushed but undeterred, she redirected her career.

Using her skills and connections, she entered the FBI’

Criminal Investigative Division as a forensic medical

specialist. For her past colleagues, it was a career

move. Secretly, it was a window for her to pursue her

own investigations regarding her husband's death.

Without telling anyone, she dug through case files:

unexplained autopsies, anomalies in forensic reports,

events that echoed what she’d seen on her husband’

s table.

She never said a word of her search to colleagues,

friends, or family. But Delta Green noticed.

Unauthorized queries, repeated hits on redacted case

numbers, her name appearing again and again where it

shouldn’t. They had already erased her husband’s

corpse, his grave had always been empty. Now, they

noticed they had left a loose end.

When they finally reached out, Samantha didn’t resist.

She'd been waiting for someone to admit what she

already knew: her husband’s death wasn’t natural.

Husband's death preceded Samantha's induction into the FBI and Delta Green by a few years. (Inducted into the FBI in 2000, DG in 2006) Before that time, the family was peaceful. Afterwards, she decided to send her son to boarding school, leaving home at the age of 13. She only sees her son in the summers, with the rare visit to his out-of-state school. Nowadays he's off to college, calling only out of necessity and a need for money. He's still affectionate towards her, but resents her for leaving him all by himself. One could say she doesn't know her own son.

messages.content: You feel like this should work if done correctly.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan suggests calling the FAA office for this region and getting information on Tiger Transit's comings and goings, and if they have any planes at the airfield - if they have the pilots on record, as well.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Cliff thinks about the ingredients for a moment.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Do you prepare it?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Yeah.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: It takes about 10 minutes to combine everything and dispense them to water bottles, diluted with water. It smells sweet and flowery.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: All of you can dose, if you wish to do so.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug is occupied with frying eggs.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What's next, we'll smoke the meth we have upstairs as a chaser?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: What's next is…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Your phone is ringing.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon looks at his phone. Any caller ID?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: The mole.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Sure, whatever. McCannon picks up. "Hello?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Cliff leaves the drugs on her workplace and secures her gloves in a plastic bag.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "FUCK Dude! I didn't do anything to him!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's the mole.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "MAN FUCK YOU! YOU'RE A LYING PIECE OF SHIT!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's not the mole.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You recognize that voice.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's…
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content:
Your mind goes back…

"I DON'T NEED YOU ANYMORE MR-"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The spoon slips off your finger.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon. If he's at the meeting…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Should probably fill the others in on those two I met in the diner, and fast.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: You raise your voice, but McCannon is in a very apparent hurry.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: On your mark.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: At what time was the mole's meet even supposed to happen?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Around noon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content:
"MAN FUCK YOU!"

Someone is in the room with him.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Does the voice sound accented?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: As in Latino?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Caucasian, young.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're really running out of time.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Who is this?" McCannon speaks into the phone, hopefully to get some sort of response.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: No answer. He doesn't have the phone against his ear, probably.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug interrupts McCannon. Straight up. Grabs his shoulder.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: "I recognize that voice."
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: "Who the fuck is it?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "It's… Okay so, some fucking… tweaker I happened to overhear in a diner a few days ago."
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: "I've got a memory for voices."
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: And then Doug attempts to summarize as best as he can. Not much to summarize, really.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: McCannon, the car keys are in front of you inside the decorative bowl..
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You got a name?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "No."
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: "Fuck it. Hop in the rides, now."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Off we go.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: We go to the meeting place. Bring the pipe bombs.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Does he know about the pipe bombs?
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: They might come in handy if we're dealing with black Chris Kyle.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Destination: Traveller's Inn Motel.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: LOADING…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I mean, on the off chance you didn't want us to know about pipe bombs - you can leave them.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: No pipe bombs.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI
4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You pull up the SUV and the Corolla a bit offscreen near the driveway and disembark.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Check your inventories and toggle your armor ON. You may wear helmets and goggles if you wish.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: If you have them crossed by mistake I'll assume they are on anyway. But half of you don't have shit.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "YOU'RE A FUCKING DOOOGG!! YOU SOLD US ALL OUT!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You can hear that from a bit ways.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: About which room?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Definitely one along that row.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Action, destination first.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: im blind as hell
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Everyone may freely re-arrange their tokens.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon will be motioning for the others to line up. YOUNG MAN is bound to scream and shout some more so we can narrow down the exact room he is in.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Right-
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan is going to go around the back of the building, these rooms probably have windows that someone might try to scurry out through.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Wait for your turn.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon, are you staying where you are or moving up?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Moving up along the wall, putting an ear up against each door for a second.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Obviously not the room next to you.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Yeah.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You try this one. Alertness, Public.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
messages.content:
CRITICAL SUCCESS!

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

Slightly overweight, brown hair combed to one side, chevron moustache.

a- Born 1980 in Paris Texas to a single mother. Rough upbringing led him to (mostly) forswear drugs and alcohol, developed a complex against middle America, 'hicks' etc.

- Became interested in computer science during the dot-com bubble and left home to study I.T at 18.

- Married in 2003 while working the help-desk at Cisco. Made the majority of his income at this time via cable piracy - running services that could decrypt smart cards, set-top boxes etc.

- Became interested in libertarianism and conspiracy culture at around this time, which tied into much of his hacking work; claims to have worked with Gary McKinnon, among others.

- Joined FBI Operational Technology division in 2005, in part for work experience and in part to enter the 'belly of beast' as far as his interests are concerned ('is the government really messing with the weather?' etc).

- Continues to work in this capacity alongside his side-hustles; regarded by colleagues as reliable, if a little eccentric.

Safe Streets and Gang Unit","nationality":"American - New Jersey","sex":"M","age":"29 - 19 May 1979","education":"Rutgers, BS in Criminology and Criminal Justics"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

messages.content: David will circle the main office.

messages.content: McCannon.

messages.content: Keep doing more of the same.

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content: It has to be the one up next.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Same.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: You're still on his six.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Makes his way to the same door those two are heading for. He also gestures to his gun and then the door as though to ask if he should pop it open when they're ready.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: You mean you're tailing them or moving up to the next car?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Next car.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Decent idea of where we're headed. Doug proceeds to move in cover at the front of the beige car, on the other side of Frank.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Works.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Moving on down.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Finnegan, you cover a neat bit of distance.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You immediately notice that this cabin is boarded up.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Oh. Great.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: David will continue circling.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: ROLL DEX. PUBLIC.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content: A guy comes out to check what the huss is about.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You immediately train your gun on him. He drops the beer bottle he is holding and raises his hands.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon waves him away inside.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: He slowly closes the door.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "What the FUCK was that…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That glass came down quite loud.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You may act.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon pushes up to the next door, standing to the side of it and leaning his head a little to listen.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Did he notice how the other guy's door opened? To the inside or outside?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: No need for yet another Alertness. You can hear two distinct heavy breathings inside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The door opens to inside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff is on your six again.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Following the other two now. If he crosses the door he might get spotted through a keyhole or something.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Since they know something's up and all.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug repositions just slightly to stay in cover behind the front of the car so he can get a better angle.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: This is as far as you go without losing partial cover.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Okay that works.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Finn.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Let me proceed very carefully up to this boarded one.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: FINNEGAN. STEALTH, PUBLIC.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

messages.content: "I KNOW YOU MOTHERFUCKERS ARE OUT THEEERE!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David actually finishes circling around the office, and is Medium range from that door.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Turn 4.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: How far is the tweaker from the door?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You don't know.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You didn't breach.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Probably a good time to kick in this door.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Getting shot in the head be damned, 'my mole' is in there.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You know better than that, to kick a door with no angles covered. You can delay that action to when you want, preferably after your teammates are in position.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Yeah.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: For now you are in front of the door.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I go by the door.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Take position.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "I GOT YOUR FUCKING FRIEND WITH ME!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Even pass the other side?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Yeah, you can do that.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff moves by the door, keeping her weapon down and waiting for the others to take position.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: In that case Earle will raise his rifle and cover the opposite side to McCannon. He's sweating bullets.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Opposite Cliff I mean
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: You're in position. McCannon, you can do it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Let's go.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Roll STR.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
messages.content:
Failure
1d100 93
  1. 93

93

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content:
THUMP!
The door withstands.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I GOT A GUN TO HIS HEAD BITCH!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That doesn't sound good.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Doug stays right where he is.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: No shit.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: And then what?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: And then… nothing?
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Can I see into the room at all, or is it just completely obscured by boarding?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: It's boarded up really well with plywood, kind of like something permanent you'd say.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Industrious fuckers. I'd better get out of the crossfire, proceed down the back to the access door past the dumpsters.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Nobody will be jumping out of this window.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You're far enough, but not quick enough to act again.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David notices you breaching and overwatches the door.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: We gotta kick this doggone door down.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: To be clear.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Frank has a rifle and could try shooting it open.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Wait for your turn. McCannon, STR Public.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
messages.content:
Success

  1. 32

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content: The door crashes open!
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He indeed does have the mole in a chokehold, with a small gun to his brain stem.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "STAY THE FUCK BACK YO!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Who the fuck are you?" McCannon says with a gun trained at the man.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Cliff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I'm moving ever so slightly to get some vision.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: No need, you already do, it's just represented weird on the battlemap.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: All 3 of you can see inside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content:
Cliff trains her weapon on the two men ahead of her.

"Kane, watch the door to my right."

She moves in and passes the door, staying a distance away from the men such that it would be very difficult to get rushed without being shot.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: You're in by a step.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I SAID. STAY. THE FUCK. BACK!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Don't do it man, c'mon - you ain't gotta do this…" And other vaguely paternal-sounding southern drawl while he trains his aim on Young Man's head. He doesn't wanna shoot him, but!..
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: You're aiming at his head.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You get a +20% from your holo, but this is still extremely risky. One inch to the wrong side and fellow federal agent is toast.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The angle is bad. You'll have to roll luck on a 33% chance compared to the regular 50%.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Let's suppose the tweaker currently holding our man hostage with a gun to their head only sees the three agents in front of him. Doug's an undefined variable.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Doug abandons cover and rounds the back of the car to get a fair distance behind Frank.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: khoka is afk
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You mean like this?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Not really what I was going for. Am I visible like this?
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Yes retard you just ran out from the back of the car.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Okay. I'm sticking with it. Let him feel the pressure.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Finn.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Inside
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Padlocked. Not from this side.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I'll check down the east side of the building to see if anything is happening there and if not, just cover behind the dumpsters to watch the barricade window.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Empty.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: khoka is back
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: You get a good look, it's certainly empty, but you can't act again.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David signals back people coming out of their rooms back inside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "LISTEN TO ME."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I'M FUCKING LEAVING NOW."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "NO MILLION DOLLARS, NO FLIGHT TO YEMEN, I'M GETTING IN MY CAR AND GOING."
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Let go of my buddy and we'll let you go, how about that!?"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "THEN GET THE FUCK OUTTA MY WAY BITCH!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Move to the fuckin' sides. Keep your guns trained on him," McCannon says to the others and takes a step back, "Any funny business and we'll open a window with a great fucking view to your brain!"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "Cmon, bring him out!"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "YEAH THAT'S RIGHT!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The turns dissolve, he is slowly backing up out of the room into his car. Acting on it could be catastrophic.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Make room for him.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He obliges and steps back.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: I'll move.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: He's not stepping ahead of the hostage.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He's fully aware of the other agents staring down the door.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: None of you made an effort to hide.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He flips around, walking backward to his car. Taking a shot on him is still extremely risky.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David hesitates. He doesn't have a rifle, and it's likely he'll kill the DEA agent.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "THIS FUCKING SON OF A BITCH DID THIS TO HIM!…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You don't know what he is talking about, really.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He's about to enter the car.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Let the man go!"
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "WHAT, YOU WANT YOUR DAMN RAT BACK?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "IS THAT WHAT YOU WANT?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "MOTHERFUCKER!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He pushes the mole forwards… and…
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.flavor: Draws a result from the Torso Critcal Wounds (8+ Dmg) table
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content:
1d6
1d6 1
  1. 1

1

  • Heart perforated

    Instant death
He drops dead on the spot.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: HE GETS IN THE CAR AND SLAMS THE GAS ON REVERSE!
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: SKREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE-
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon unleashes a barrage of bullets into the car.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Firearms, no bonus from long burst.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
messages.content:
Failure
1d100 65
  1. 65

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - New York","sex":"F","age":"36 - October 13 1971","education":"NYU Grossman School of Medicine."},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Samantha appears to be in her thirties with a comely nose and a sharp face. She's of average height, and aging has only recently started to creep in her features. She's of average weight, with dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. Furrows have started to form on her temple.

Samantha was interested in medicine from the moment

she listened to her father's heartbeat through his

stethescope. Smart and disciplined, she pushed through

a difficult education to become a trauma surgeon at the

NYU Grossman School of Medicine. By her early

thirties, she had already carved herself a reputation as a

skilled clinician and an accomplished researcher,

working to further the field of emergency medicine.

That reputation was tested the night her husband was

brought into her own hospital. He had been attacked,

initial reports indicating a mugging-gone-wrong.

Samantha was on call and prepared to operate, but

what she found was wrong; his bones and organs were

liquefied, and his vascular system ruptured in patterns

no aneurysm or illness could possibly explain.

She barely had time to process it before the body was

taken from her custody. Within hours, the chart was

scrubbed, and official records listed his death as a “

catastrophic hemorrhage.” Samantha, however,

remembered every detail. She knew what she saw, and

she knew someone else had made sure she wouldn't be

allowed to prove it.

Crushed but undeterred, she redirected her career.

Using her skills and connections, she entered the FBI’

Criminal Investigative Division as a forensic medical

specialist. For her past colleagues, it was a career

move. Secretly, it was a window for her to pursue her

own investigations regarding her husband's death.

Without telling anyone, she dug through case files:

unexplained autopsies, anomalies in forensic reports,

events that echoed what she’d seen on her husband’

s table.

She never said a word of her search to colleagues,

friends, or family. But Delta Green noticed.

Unauthorized queries, repeated hits on redacted case

numbers, her name appearing again and again where it

shouldn’t. They had already erased her husband’s

corpse, his grave had always been empty. Now, they

noticed they had left a loose end.

When they finally reached out, Samantha didn’t resist.

She'd been waiting for someone to admit what she

already knew: her husband’s death wasn’t natural.

Husband's death preceded Samantha's induction into the FBI and Delta Green by a few years. (Inducted into the FBI in 2000, DG in 2006) Before that time, the family was peaceful. Afterwards, she decided to send her son to boarding school, leaving home at the age of 13. She only sees her son in the summers, with the rare visit to his out-of-state school. Nowadays he's off to college, calling only out of necessity and a need for money. He's still affectionate towards her, but resents her for leaving him all by himself. One could say she doesn't know her own son.

Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - New York","sex":"F","age":"36 - October 13 1971","education":"NYU Grossman School of Medicine."},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Samantha appears to be in her thirties with a comely nose and a sharp face. She's of average height, and aging has only recently started to creep in her features. She's of average weight, with dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. Furrows have started to form on her temple.

Samantha was interested in medicine from the moment

she listened to her father's heartbeat through his

stethescope. Smart and disciplined, she pushed through

a difficult education to become a trauma surgeon at the

NYU Grossman School of Medicine. By her early

thirties, she had already carved herself a reputation as a

skilled clinician and an accomplished researcher,

working to further the field of emergency medicine.

That reputation was tested the night her husband was

brought into her own hospital. He had been attacked,

initial reports indicating a mugging-gone-wrong.

Samantha was on call and prepared to operate, but

what she found was wrong; his bones and organs were

liquefied, and his vascular system ruptured in patterns

no aneurysm or illness could possibly explain.

She barely had time to process it before the body was

taken from her custody. Within hours, the chart was

scrubbed, and official records listed his death as a “

catastrophic hemorrhage.” Samantha, however,

remembered every detail. She knew what she saw, and

she knew someone else had made sure she wouldn't be

allowed to prove it.

Crushed but undeterred, she redirected her career.

Using her skills and connections, she entered the FBI’

Criminal Investigative Division as a forensic medical

specialist. For her past colleagues, it was a career

move. Secretly, it was a window for her to pursue her

own investigations regarding her husband's death.

Without telling anyone, she dug through case files:

unexplained autopsies, anomalies in forensic reports,

events that echoed what she’d seen on her husband’

s table.

She never said a word of her search to colleagues,

friends, or family. But Delta Green noticed.

Unauthorized queries, repeated hits on redacted case

numbers, her name appearing again and again where it

shouldn’t. They had already erased her husband’s

corpse, his grave had always been empty. Now, they

noticed they had left a loose end.

When they finally reached out, Samantha didn’t resist.

She'd been waiting for someone to admit what she

already knew: her husband’s death wasn’t natural.

Husband's death preceded Samantha's induction into the FBI and Delta Green by a few years. (Inducted into the FBI in 2000, DG in 2006) Before that time, the family was peaceful. Afterwards, she decided to send her son to boarding school, leaving home at the age of 13. She only sees her son in the summers, with the rare visit to his out-of-state school. Nowadays he's off to college, calling only out of necessity and a need for money. He's still affectionate towards her, but resents her for leaving him all by himself. One could say she doesn't know her own son.

Slightly overweight, brown hair combed to one side, chevron moustache.

a- Born 1980 in Paris Texas to a single mother. Rough upbringing led him to (mostly) forswear drugs and alcohol, developed a complex against middle America, 'hicks' etc.

- Became interested in computer science during the dot-com bubble and left home to study I.T at 18.

- Married in 2003 while working the help-desk at Cisco. Made the majority of his income at this time via cable piracy - running services that could decrypt smart cards, set-top boxes etc.

- Became interested in libertarianism and conspiracy culture at around this time, which tied into much of his hacking work; claims to have worked with Gary McKinnon, among others.

- Joined FBI Operational Technology division in 2005, in part for work experience and in part to enter the 'belly of beast' as far as his interests are concerned ('is the government really messing with the weather?' etc).

- Continues to work in this capacity alongside his side-hustles; regarded by colleagues as reliable, if a little eccentric.

Hurts when I run, might affect my lungs.","firstAidAttempted":false,"exhausted":false,"exhaustedPenalty":-20},"biography":{"profession":"Special Agent - FBI D.C. Criminal Investigative Division","employer":"FBI Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - Florida","sex":"M","age":"37 - 22 Feb 1971","education":"UFHW Florida, B.A. in Civil Engineering"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Ex-police officer from FLPD.

Medium height, pale man. Bright eyes contrasted by sleepless circles under. Moustache, no beard. Thick arms, contrasted by a relatively thin frame.

1990: 19 years old. Officially joined Police Force.

1996: 25 years old.

As Police: Responded to a missing persons crime. Investigated a mineshaft, where contact with something killed my team. The missing person re-appeared without any indication that they'd been missing shortly after.

Dismissed from force after 6 years service.

2000: Got my degree in Civil Engineering, and a certificate in demolition. Worked as a construction engineer for 4 years.

2004: At some point this year, someone showed him a photo of the blue dress. Then, the call. I have been made aware of Delta Green since this point, and performed small-scale tasks under the infrequent request. I have made no brushes with the truly unnatural, outside of the mineshaft. Additionally, I received a tip-off that the Federal Bureau had received word of my work in the force and wished to hire me on.

Joined as a Parole Agent.

2005: Completed work as a Parole Agent at a field office. After a year, I was transferred to D.C. due to extraordinary competence. It's likely some strings were pulled. I haven't questioned them.

2008: Present. I have worked in the FBI for 4 years and received only rare tip-offs from DG.

messages.content: He BACKS UP INTO THE OTHER CAR.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He continues to gas it up.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon, you have one more shot on him.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Is he just reversing into another car?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: He's going to eventually reverse PAST it and get away.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Slam it against the wall sideways.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon is going to shoot again.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Shot type, then roll firearms.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Burst into the car.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content: Long I assume.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Yea
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: A few shots hit the engine to no avail.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Heavily battered up, he escapes using his un-hit foot.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David runs up.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Holy fuck… Is he dead?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You can see the Mexican housekeepers look through the glass.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "What does it LOOK LIKE?"
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: "Yeah, our in with the black psycho just got shot in the heart."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: As the shots were popping, you manage to jimmy the door open with the Halligan bar. You're strong enough.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I want to turn left.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Thank God.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: looking at a wall gang.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: It's dark in here. You turn your light on.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's a man, on the floor.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: African-American. Butt-naked, covered in his own shit and piss. He is in a fetal position, clawing away from you in pure terror.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "HAAAAA!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "YAAAAAHH!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Turn me left please.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: He looks high.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What I see the rest of the interior, is it just him?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Blasted off earth high.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's just him, yes, you may enter.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: There, you see it. Dozens and dozens of white bags… shopping bags?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Roll Alertness.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd
messages.content:
Failure
1d100 73
  1. 73

73

Safe Streets and Gang Unit","nationality":"American - New Jersey","sex":"M","age":"29 - 19 May 1979","education":"Rutgers, BS in Criminology and Criminal Justics"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

messages.content: You get distracted by the blue and white pills all around, in his own gaita.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon breaches a very obvious fake wall.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Everyone else is still outside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The man in front of you is in tatters.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Whatever description of him falls apart. He is like a cornered, sick animal.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He can be in tatters in handcuffs.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "HIYAAAHH!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Motherfucker, stay still!"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: It's fucking gross. He doesn't look like in the mood to run away.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David is going to watch over the body.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Rest of you may go inside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff walks into the room.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content:
"Youuu- yes YOUUU!!!"

He points at McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I know why you're HEEREEEEE Agent!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff stands on the bed and looks over the wall, looking somewhat comedic in a suit with the backdrop of a methlab.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "Wow."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Cliff. Roll Pharmacy, Blind.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI
messages.content:
Success

Criminal Investigative Division","nationality":"American - New York","sex":"F","age":"36 - October 13 1971","education":"NYU Grossman School of Medicine."},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Samantha appears to be in her thirties with a comely nose and a sharp face. She's of average height, and aging has only recently started to creep in her features. She's of average weight, with dirty blonde hair and brown eyes. Furrows have started to form on her temple.

Samantha was interested in medicine from the moment

she listened to her father's heartbeat through his

stethescope. Smart and disciplined, she pushed through

a difficult education to become a trauma surgeon at the

NYU Grossman School of Medicine. By her early

thirties, she had already carved herself a reputation as a

skilled clinician and an accomplished researcher,

working to further the field of emergency medicine.

That reputation was tested the night her husband was

brought into her own hospital. He had been attacked,

initial reports indicating a mugging-gone-wrong.

Samantha was on call and prepared to operate, but

what she found was wrong; his bones and organs were

liquefied, and his vascular system ruptured in patterns

no aneurysm or illness could possibly explain.

She barely had time to process it before the body was

taken from her custody. Within hours, the chart was

scrubbed, and official records listed his death as a “

catastrophic hemorrhage.” Samantha, however,

remembered every detail. She knew what she saw, and

she knew someone else had made sure she wouldn't be

allowed to prove it.

Crushed but undeterred, she redirected her career.

Using her skills and connections, she entered the FBI’

Criminal Investigative Division as a forensic medical

specialist. For her past colleagues, it was a career

move. Secretly, it was a window for her to pursue her

own investigations regarding her husband's death.

Without telling anyone, she dug through case files:

unexplained autopsies, anomalies in forensic reports,

events that echoed what she’d seen on her husband’

s table.

She never said a word of her search to colleagues,

friends, or family. But Delta Green noticed.

Unauthorized queries, repeated hits on redacted case

numbers, her name appearing again and again where it

shouldn’t. They had already erased her husband’s

corpse, his grave had always been empty. Now, they

noticed they had left a loose end.

When they finally reached out, Samantha didn’t resist.

She'd been waiting for someone to admit what she

already knew: her husband’s death wasn’t natural.

Husband's death preceded Samantha's induction into the FBI and Delta Green by a few years. (Inducted into the FBI in 2000, DG in 2006) Before that time, the family was peaceful. Afterwards, she decided to send her son to boarding school, leaving home at the age of 13. She only sees her son in the summers, with the rare visit to his out-of-state school. Nowadays he's off to college, calling only out of necessity and a need for money. He's still affectionate towards her, but resents her for leaving him all by himself. One could say she doesn't know her own son.

}},"specialTrainingName":null},"dice":[],"formula":"1d100","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":100,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":3,"active":true}]}],"total":3,"evaluated":true}

messages.content: He suddenly turns to McCannon with a comic-shock look.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: You can tell with certainty that there is no drug producing capacity here. It's too small, for starters, and the equipment is just not there.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Seems like it's just a storage hub."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content:
"And I knowww why youuu're here TOOOOO!!!"

He points at Finnegan, sounding totally deranged.

"I KNOOOOWWW about your BOOOKKKK!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Is the very obvious firearm on the table over there supposed to be here or just… window dressing?
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: That seems to be a SCAR-H with a variable optic attached.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: That's so.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Finnegan looks like he could explode through his glasses from the pressure behind his eyes. He just gapes.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Likely what he would use to kill you if he wasn't completely dzoinked.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You can pick it up.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff carefully climbs over the wall, and drops into the room.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: This thing is actually beautiful, and very recent too. When you consider he is PMC and not just army anymore, it makes sense.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Take anything interesting and get this guy cuffed so we can fuckin' exfil."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Got some monitors and… boxes here?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "WHY LEAVE SO FAST AGENT? DON'T YOU WANT TO TALK ABOUT THE DAY YOUR CASE OFFICER MET THAT ALIEN IN NEBRASKA?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What are these?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: What did he just say?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Don't mind if I go, Earle thinks, taking the Scar to deposit in the trunk.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Finnegan doesn't want to touch him again.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Cliff, knelt over some machinery, turns wide eyed at the black man.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: McCannon. You have no idea why, but you have an inexplicably CERTAINTY that you know what he is talking about.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The sense of deja-vu is matchless.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Roll 1d2, blind.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d2","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":2,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":2,"active":true}]}],"total":2,"evaluated":true}
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: By all metrics, he is supposed to have no idea that such a thing happened, not even you should have known, but you KNOW it did. Thanks to him?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "BUT THAT'S NOT IT!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I WAS THERE WHEN YOUR PREDECESSORS FIRED THE FIRST TORPEDO AT THE ------"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You didn't get that last sentence.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff bumps her elbow on Earle.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "The fuck is he on about?"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: She's speaking silently.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "He needs his stomach pumped."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "I WAS THERE WHEN THEIR ANCESTORS CROSSED THE FROZEN DOGERLAND INTO BRITAIN! OH HOW THEY LABORED ON RAZOR COLD ICE!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "I wonder what the insides of his brain look line by now."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "AND I WAS THERE WHEN THEY RIPPED OUT THE FIRST INFANT HEART ON THE MONTEZUMA!!! SUCH INTENSE TEARS!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "What the hell are we letting him rant on for?! Sam, you've gotta get him under control!--"
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "Or-- or anyone!"
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "WAIT! YOU THINK THAT'S ANYTHING?!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug is greatly uncomfortable, for no apparent reason discernible to himself.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: He says, hoping to foist the duty of manhandling a shit-covered psycho to someone else.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: "Finnegan, give him a fucking brogan adjustment."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "Hey look, even if he's not bullshitting, we don't need to hear this shit."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "STOP! SHUT UP! JUST -- SHUT UP!"
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Someone grab his ass right now!"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "FINNEGAN! SNAP OUT OF IT!"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: She's shouting by now.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "A LIZARD MAN, HE LABORS IN HIS LABORATORY TO ENSLAVE THE HOMINID! HOW THEY VARY IN SIZE, HIS GIANT NEIGHBOUR GRAZING RIGHT OUTSIDE IN THE RAINFOREST…"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: AHAHAHAHAHAH!!
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: She rushes past, almost tripping over.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: "Finnegan!"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: His words devolve into meaninglessness.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "AND SO THE POLYPS WERE SUBJUGUATED BY THE MI-GO- AND- AND!!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He is losing control
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "HUhuHuhHAHAHeaaaaAAAAAAA!!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "COLORS ALL AROUND ME!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I want to slip between McCannon and Finnegan to punch him in the face.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: The black dude.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Cliff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Right before you do that, you see something leaking out of the corners of his eyes.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Something iridescent. Something exactly like the amygdala you examined.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "What the-"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Finnegan stumbles out the door to retch in the alleyway.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "BUT FIRST, THE RELENTLESS HOUNDS HAD PREYED ON ALL SONS OF THE CURVES-"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "OH GOD! IT'S IN MY BRAIN!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff slowly walks back, pulling out her gun and training it on him.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: McCannon anticipates a blowout like the club bathroom and takes several long steps back.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Reality cracks around you.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "No, don't do i--"
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Angles, corners, lights, all pile up into a giant pile of shattered glass and explode back into the corners of where things used to be.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You have no idea where is where.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "What the fuck-"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: From the center, it emerges.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Dosed. We're dosed. It's in the air in the room. We're fucking dosed."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Finnegan, you think this is what the old man meant by God.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You've got to be shitting me."
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Oh my God.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: THIS IS THE GATE TO THE WOMB OF THE EARTH. WE WILL ENTER IT AND BE REBORN.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: It's in the center of the room, and at the same time, it's all around it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "Oh God…"
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Finnegan closes his eyes and tries to think of nothing.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: In your heart of hearts, all of you know that it's here to claim what it belongs to it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Everyone.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Blind roll, d20.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI
rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI
rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d20","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":20,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":19,"active":true}]}],"total":19,"evaluated":true}

messages.content: For some reason McCannon feels as if now would be a good time to take a large dose of lorazepam.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d20","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":20,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":7,"active":true}]}],"total":7,"evaluated":true}
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8
rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d20","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":20,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":9,"active":true}]}],"total":9,"evaluated":true}

messages.content: You can overdose and kill yourself if you wish to take the easy way out. But you know it's not you who it wants.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Someone took far too much.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Who's the lucky winner?
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: Finnegan, you're keeping it together, somewhat. This has got to be a drug induced hallucination that you were exposed to when you were cooking that Liao.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I knew it.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: McCannon, likewise, the lorazepam prevents you from feeling any emotion to it's edge.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: This is why your family fucking hates you, you realize.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The door to the other side is right there. You just have to throw it open. You're awfully close to leaving sanity behind and entering a world of your own making.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: But for now, you're content to peeking from its edges.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: What happened before you defies all explanation. But at the same time, it makes perfect sense, that none of this is real.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're completely dissociated, from your body and from your surroundings.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: 'I BID THE FORMS TO SPEAK. I DELIGHT TO FIND THEM DANCING HERE!'
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Unless someone helps you, you're under locked-in syndrome. You fall like a sack of potatoes on the floor.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Your understanding of the human condition is permanently torn asunder.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: From the amygdala, to the wavelength anomaly in the molecule, to this.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: God help you in the rest of your short and pathetic life. If he is out there.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: For now, you're cowering, dissociated much like Doug.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: David.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff curls up in a ball and stops moving.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d20","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":20,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":10,"active":true}]}],"total":10,"evaluated":true}
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You're in the same territory of reality as you were in that warehouse.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Only now, you're incapable of fighting back.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Whatever this thing is, you can not flee it.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It will find you wherever you go.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: what's my psychological condition rn
messages.author: DoM7eqO1VjlEAUwI

messages.content: gone
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The awful thing begins tearing Cole apart.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.flavor: Draws a result from the Leg Serious Wounds (5, 6, 7 Dmg) table
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d6","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":6,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":2,"active":true}]}],"total":2,"evaluated":true}
messages.content:
1d6
1d6 2
  1. 2

2

  • Achilles severed

    CONx5 Stun

    Crawl only. DEXx5 to walk
It rips apart his foot in an awesome arc of blood, instantly crystallizing into flying gems.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The man is unresponsive to the pain.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Clockwise, act.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: There's no getting out of this space, is there?
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: I have nothing to tell you. You're struggling to make tails and ends of reality.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff remains unresponsive on the ground.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: I shoot Cole.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Firearms at a -20.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

Safe Streets and Gang Unit","nationality":"American - New Jersey","sex":"M","age":"29 - 19 May 1979","education":"Rutgers, BS in Criminology and Criminal Justics"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

RED-FACED NEW ENGLAND G-MAN. A LIFETIME OF BUZZED HAIR. METICULOUSLY CLEAN-SHAVEN. HEAVY GLASSES.

RICHARD JOHN FINNEGAN. His pastor says the

middle name refers to the apostle; his parents picked it

to honor the late, great Irish Catholic president of the

United States. A third-generation New Jersey badge-

wearer.

A serious, driven asset to national security routinely

grappling with his unfortunate;y \"weak stomach\".

Growing up, he had the flu every winter - on assignment

to Washington, allergies kept him nearly bedridden. A

consummate \"clean freak\" at home and at work.

At Rutgers, he was able to turn a orientalist interest in

Chinese literature into a valuable professional skill: After

being offered a position in the FBI, he's been perpetually

on call to the west coast, to Manhattan and other

hotbeds of Mandarin-speaking crime, foreign and

domestic.

An active Chinese fiction discussion forum poster.

messages.content: Was that a long burst or?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's a handgun, with everything it's got.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: You send a few rounds down past the thing.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The bullets slow down and deflect into impossible angles off of its crystal-plate iridescent scales.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: One of the bullets fly back to you slowly, as in pushed gently against 0g environment.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You look at it spin past and away you.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Roll 1d4. Blind.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: After all, this may not be a drug hallucination.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff is unresponsive, a crying mess on the floor.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon stares absently at the thing.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He wants to shoot at the thing but he's scared that resisting will turn the 'trip' bad. Or that it will tear him apart. Instead he grabs the psychotic Doug by the shoulders and screams at him to get it together.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: 'I AM A CAPTAIN OF MY WILL. THIS IS MERE REFRACTED LIGHT, IT MUST OBEY ME!' But nothing happens. Doug is drooling on the floor in the fetal position.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Your Psychotherapy roll is an autofail. He is too far gone.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The thing sates its hunger.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff can be heared mumbling to herself.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.flavor: Draws a result from the Arm Critical Wounds (8+ Dmg) table
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d6","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":6,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":1,"active":true}]}],"total":1,"evaluated":true}
messages.content:
1d6
1d6 1
  1. 1

1

  • Arm severed / mangled

    Potential loss of limb

    CONx5 Coma every turn bleeding continues after the wound

CRUNCH!!

It tears up bone and flesh and gulps it down in its abyssal stomach.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content:
"AAAAHHHHH!!!"

He seems sober in his last moments.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: I can't help him. I tried.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: No actions?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff is still mumbling to herself.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: There's nothing to be done.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Perhaps that acceptance will keep you alive for another day.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He's just got a wait this trip out. He knows he's outclassed.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Roll POW.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

1d100 82
  1. 82

82

Counterterrorism Division","nationality":"USA - Baltimore","sex":"M","age":"34 - September 7 1973","education":"UB B.A. Criminal Justice"},"corruption":{"value":0,"haveSeenTheYellowSign":false,"gift":"","insight":""},"physicalDescription":"

Brown hair and small, baby blue eyes, of average height and build.

UB B.A. Criminal Justice

Born a military brat to officer father in Fort Meade, a life in the service of the government of the United States of America was certainly not unexpected, if a little typical of people of similar backgrounds.

Joining Baltimore PD in 1995, and graduating with a B.S. in Criminal Justice from the University of Baltimore in 1999 Michael, feeling constrained by the limitations of service to his nation in Baltimore, joined the FBI that same year, undergoing his 20 weeks at the FBI Academy in Quantico and quickly joining it's Criminal Investigative Division.

Post 9/11 Michael volunteered to transfer to FBI's Counterterrorism Division and spent the better part of the early 2000s helping hunt America's enemies within and without, transferring back to the CID in late 2006.

messages.content:
In an ancient tongue of unspeakable malice, it screeches directly into your mind.

"DO YOU DOUBT ME?"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: McCannon falls on his knees and slumps.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Blind 1d4.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Your submission satisfies the thing.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: He stares the creature dead in the eyes knowing there's naught else he can do.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: 'WHY, WHY DON'T YOU LISTEN?! WHEN I SPEAK, TRUTH HAPPENS!' It's still of no use. If this keeps up, Doug might become permanently mentally retarded -- if he hasn't already.
messages.author: rGQWFMrwXQMDudzI

messages.content: Is it a look of absentia or introspection?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Introspection.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: Roll 1d6. Blind.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

rolls: {"class":"Roll","options":{},"dice":[],"formula":"1d6","terms":[{"class":"Die","options":{"flavor":null},"evaluated":true,"number":1,"faces":6,"modifiers":[],"results":[{"result":3,"active":true}]}],"total":3,"evaluated":true}
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: You always knew, you should have just ran away from it the moment that man started raving.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Something inside of you has snapped with a disgusting crunch, but you're too numb to feel it right now.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The thing will rend its victim.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

ANGULAR APPORT: On a successful Angular Apport skill roll, the hound can leap into or emerge from any sharp, physical angle—a corner of a room, the lip of a table, or even the hinge on a pair of glasses—effectively teleporting between those two points instantly no matter the distance. In this manner they pursue their prey, so outrunning them is an unlikely outcome, no matter the speed of escape.

CURVED SPACE: Exposure to large areas composed of curves, spheres or circular surfaces causes the hound’s “swarm” of shards to lose coherency. The hound is well aware of this weakness, and does its best to avoid and flee such areas. Each turn of exposure to such a space causes the hound 1D6 damage. If reduced to 0 HP from exposure to curves, the hound disintegrates and seems to fold out of three-dimensional space (likely returning it to its place of origin).

INCONSTANT FORM: The hound can fold, change, stretch, extend and warp its form in amazing ways, altering its size as needed from moment to moment. It can effectively attack anyone within 10 meters by directing its form to a new location. Because it has no “body” and is instead composed of a thousand swirling, reflective shards of space-time, the hound is immune to all attacks except hypergeometry.

INHUMAN STATS: A test of a stat with a score of 20 or higher is a critical success on any roll up to the stat’s score, and on any roll of matching digits except 100, which fumbles.

SHARD SWEEP: The hound unleashes two “limbs” composed of shards, peppering a target with 2D6 damage. It ignores body armor but can be blocked by cover.

SHARD SWARM: The hound engulfs the victim in a swirling mass of shards, rendering the target down to a bloody mess with a Lethality attack of 10%. It ignores body armor but can be blocked by cover.

SAN LOSS: 1D6/1D20.
