messages.content:
It fails to finish him fast. Instead, you hear him scream the whole way through.

"AIIIIIIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEeeeeeeeee!"

Finally it stops.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It taunts you in eternal hatred once more.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The thing folds into itself like an origami and disappears back where it came as quick as it showed up.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: The man is gone. In his place, not even a drop of blood.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff falls onto the bags to her right, her face barely missing the concrete.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: David, Doug and Cliff are unconscious. Their psyches couldn't tolerate much more.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Earle, you feel inhuman.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan, McCannon, the more you think the more it hurts. But at least you can still think.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's time to act.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan touches the wall to make sure it's solid and real. "…I'll back in. The SUV, I mean."
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: "Help me with these morons."
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: Before you go, you take a closer look at the bags.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "We can't leave any of this, everyone, everything, it all has to go in the car.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: There are dozens, hundreds of them. All empty. You also notice that the shit-covered Reverb is also gone.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliffs fingers periodically twitch, as does the rest of her body in spasms.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: The inside of the room is trashed. It no longer looks tidy.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Strangely, the outside is intact.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: "You're right," Frank says without paying the least bit of attention to their words. "Lemme just… get some fresh air…"
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: He heads outside.
messages.author: TLoil0zu5jJvT6zd

messages.content: McCannon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You trip over a laptop, still working somehow.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Is it on?
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: No, but the small lights on it are. It's on sleep mode.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: We take that.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: "HEY SOMEONE CALL 911!"
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: You hear an unknown voice outside.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: It's time to get the fuck outta here.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: So it is.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Finnegan wants to swing the SUV around the back so we can throw everyone and everything in. McCannon has to drive the second car, Earle shouldn't.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Sure.
messages.author: leqfJ3KIQNqNXMV8

messages.content: How empathetic of you.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Someone here has to be a human being.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: A crowd is around David and the mole. How do you disperse them?
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Tell them it's a fucking crime scene and they need to stay back before they contaminate it, fifty feet, minimum.
messages.author: PgyzRoJpXTIEjkpd

messages.content: Then, a badge is shown.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Cliff's unconscious body, in full suit, remains visible from the outside.
messages.author: YZosE7uqfWlBpjlI

messages.content: There's an adress on each of the bags. It's right where the hood ends and the suburbs begin. You'll remember it in detail soon.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Until then.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Until then, you have no choice but to keep driving ahead.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Reverberations - Session 5 End.
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr

messages.content: Thanks for playing!
messages.author: 4CGWQNBhrWtE51Tr
